comments: Tucker (MIA) engages and disengages with Tatum (BOS) as Tatum moves to set the pick.
Tatum (BOS) establishes himself in a screening position in Strus' (MIA) path and absorbs the contact.

After initially engaging with one another following the expiration of the pick, Tatum (BOS) grasps and then quickly releases Strus' (MIA) left arm as they each attempt to establish position inside the perimeter.
Tucker (MIA) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Tatum (BOS) prior to any incidental contact being made by him or Strus (MIA).
Adebayo (MIA) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
White (BOS) reaches in and makes marginal contact with Tucker's (MIA) side that does not affect his SQBR.
Strus (MIA) is retreating alongside Tatum's (BOS) path and absorbs the marginal body contact that occurs at the end of Tatum's drive.
Tatum (BOS) extends his arm forward to pursue the rebound and incidental contact occurs with Tucker's (MIA) left arm as Tucker retrieves the ball.
White (BOS) makes clean contact with the ball and the contact with Tucker's (MIA) hand on the ball is considered incidental.
Oladipo (MIA) and Smart (BOS) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.
Adebayo (MIA) engages and disengages with Horford (BOS) as Horford moves to set the pick.
Adebayo (MIA) is moving alongside Brown's (BOS) path and marginal contact occurs with Brown's left side as he gathers at the end of the drive.
Tucker (MIA) raises his left arm to pursue the rebound and incidental contact occurs with Horford's (BOS) right arm.
Smart (BOS) and Adebayo (MIA) move toward one another to pursue the loose ball and the two players make incidental contact with each other.
Tatum (BOS) slides his pivot foot at the start of his dribble.
Oladipo (MIA) and Tucker (MIA) each legally contest Tatum's (BOS) driving shot attempt.
Smart (BOS) and Butler (MIA) engage and disengage with one another off ball.
Brown (BOS) briefly has his arm around Butler's (MIA) upper half before quickly sliding it off.
White (BOS) engages and disengages with Tucker (MIA) as Tucker moves to set the pick.
Tucker (MIA) and Brown (BOS) engage and disengage with one another as the defensive switch occurs following the expiration of the pick.
White (BOS) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Butler (MIA) during Butler's upward shooting motion.
White (BOS) touches the ball last before it goes out of bounds.
Smart (BOS) moves forward slightly and marginal contact occurs with Butler's (MIA) back and left side as Butler gains control of the inbound.
White (BOS) legally contests Butler's (MIA) jump shot attempt.

Replay review of the foul called on Strus (MIA) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. Strus (MIA) initiates contact with Tatum's (BOS) left wrist prior to making contact with the ball, affecting Tatum's SQBR. The game clock was reset to 0:40.7.
Smart (BOS) turns with his forearm slightly extended forward and marginal contact occurs with Butler's (MIA) front as Butler dribbles in transition.
Smart (BOS) brings a hand and forearm toward Butler's (MIA) path and marginal contact occurs with Butler's front as he drives inside the perimeter.
Brown (BOS) brushes Butler's (MIA) front and marginal contact occurs prior to Butler releasing the pass.
Vincent (MIA) does not step out of bounds as he starts his dribble along the sideline.
Adebayo (MIA) engages and disengages with Horford (BOS) as Horford moves to defend the drive.
Horford (BOS) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Vincent (MIA) at the end of the drive.
Adebayo (MIA) is in the lane for longer than three seconds.
Adebayo (MIA) moves around Smart (BOS) to position himself for the rebound and does not dislodge Smart from his position.
Smart (BOS) and Tucker (MIA) make incidental foot to foot contact in transition.

After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the floor of a personal foul on Oladipo (MIA) is overturned to an offensive foul on Brown (BOS). Oladipo beats Brown to the spot and establishes a legal guarding position outside of the restricted area prior to Brown initiating the contact.  This is a reviewable matter because it is a restricted area play that occurs inside the last two minutes of the fourth quarter.
Tatum (BOS) commits a take foul on Butler (MIA).
Vincent (MIA) is already in Pritchard's (BOS) path and marginal contact occurs prior to when they disengage during the inbound.
White (BOS) does not inbound the ball within five seconds.
Horford (BOS) sets the screen on Tucker (MIA) and briefly has his arm around Tucker's upper half before sliding it off.
Smart (BOS) dislodges Vincent (MIA) from his position during the rebound.
